EmailTemplate.name: 911 Maintenance Window Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: 911 Maintenance Window Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
TriTech is needing a maintenance window to complete work needed for ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Issue Description:
Proposed Solution:
Downtime Needed:
Downtime Impact:
Rollback Plan:
Please contact technician {!Case.OwnerFullName} to coordinate this maintenance window that is needed.
Thank you,
TriTech Technical Support Team
800-987-0911 Option 3
inform911support@tritech.com
